snippet: The North American Olive Oil Association contends that Kangadis Food falsely labeled its Capatriti brand as olive oil when the product is a fat from leftover olive skins and pits.
abstract: North American Olive Oil Association is suing Kangadis Food, saying it falsely labeled its Capatriti brand as olive oil when product is a fat from leftover olive skins and pits.
lead_paragraph: The North American Olive Oil Association contends that Kangadis Food falsely labeled its Capatriti brand as olive oil when the product is a fat from leftover olive skins and pits.

headline.seo: Trade Group Lawsuit Challenges Olive Oil Labeling
headline.main: Trade Group Lawsuit Challenges Olive Oil Labeling
headline.print_headline: Trade Group Lawsuit Accuses Food Company of Selling Skin-and-Pit Product as Olive Oil
